fluid.tinkers_advanced.gaseous_lava.flui: Higher temperature, higher damage, very reasonable!
fluid.tinkers_advanced.molten_activated_: The very fluid of all elements.Highly reactive and aggressive.
fluid.tinkers_advanced.molten_antimatter: Antimatter is highly explosive.Don't spill it over!
fluid.tinkers_advanced.molten_antimony.f: Nobody know why such a heavy metal could be linked to plague.
fluid.tinkers_advanced.molten_basalz_sig: Basalz Signalum is the best fluid to pierce your enemies' armor.Also good for mining.
fluid.tinkers_advanced.molten_biltz_lumi: Blitz Lumium can disable enemies and reduce their damage.
fluid.tinkers_advanced.molten_bismuth.fl: Reduce armor and increase damage taken.
fluid.tinkers_advanced.molten_blizz_ende: Blizz Enderium is extremely cold ,capable of freezing targets.
fluid.tinkers_advanced.molten_neutronite: Fluid-form Neutronite can instantly tears your target into particles.
Proto Poison can permanently reduce 25% target's health, and -20% life regeneration per level during effect duration.
This super-hot fluid can deal fire damage to entities.
fluid.tinkers_advanced.pyrotheum.fluid_e: The implemented form of pyrogen.One of the 'hottest' topic.
info.tinkers_advanced.electron_tuner.cle: Deal AOE damage on hit, +3 Severing level.
info.tinkers_advanced.electron_tuner.swo: Deal AOE damage on swinging (Main hand).
info.tinkers_advanced.hidden_material: Hidden materials can't be crafted normally, That's why you can't find it's recipe.You need to hold shift and solve the puzzle given. If shift is not working, The material might be banned and you can never obtain it, sad :(
item.tinkers_advanced.electron_tuner.des: Electron Tuner is an adjustable melee weapon that has adjustable attack speed. Shift-Right click to open it's interface.
item.tinkers_advanced.ionized_cannon.des: Ionized Cannon is a middle-ranged melee weapon that consume fluid to attack.Shoots plasma ray that deals sonic damage after charging.Cast fluid effects to nearby targets on hit (Effects similar to spilling modifier).
item.tinkers_advanced.matter_manipulator: Matter Manipulator is an efficient mining tool,shoots mining laser when using.It can either simply mine block or performing block effects during combat.Right-click in inventory to switch mode.
material.tinkers_advanced.activated_chro: Each durability loss takes 500FE.When Activated:Each blocking consumes 20kFE.When Empowered:Each damage takes 2kFE to cancel.
Each durability loss takes 500FE.When Activated:dig speed+100%(consumes 100FE),consumes 250FE on attack.When Empowered:consume 500FE to create slash.
Highly reactive alloy made of magical metals and elemental energy.
Each durability loss takes 500FE.When Activated:Consume 500FE to create arrow,boost 1 arrow damage.When Empowered:Consume extra 1000FE for arrow explosion.
material.tinkers_advanced.antimatter.fla: It's funny to see how antimatter can be safely put into a smeltery.
material.tinkers_advanced.antimony.flavo: Don't worry, It won't annihilate your money.
material.tinkers_advanced.basalz_signalu: Sundered effect reduces 25% armor each level.
Magical material that has a close relation with terra.
Sundered effect reduces 25% armor each level.
material.tinkers_advanced.bismuth.armor: Each levels of tetanus reduces 2 armor.
material.tinkers_advanced.bismuth.encycl: Each levels of tetanus reduces 2 armor.
material.tinkers_advanced.bismuth.flavor: Bismuth is known for the beautiful shape of bismuth crystal.
material.tinkers_advanced.bismuth.ranged: Each levels of tetanus reduces 2 armor.
material.tinkers_advanced.bismuthinite.a: Reduce 20% damage when below 5,otherwise increase 10%,after armor value is calculated.
material.tinkers_advanced.bismuthinite.f: Basic form of bismuth ore in the nature.
material.tinkers_advanced.blaze_netherit: Infernally hot metal that repairs itself when heated.
material.tinkers_advanced.blitz_lumium.e: Shocked effect reduces 3 damage each level.The arc deals 2+0.5*level damage
material.tinkers_advanced.blitz_lumium.f: Radiant material that constantly sending electric impulses.
material.tinkers_advanced.blitz_lumium.r: Shocked effect reduces 3 damage each level.The arc deals 2+0.5*level damage
material.tinkers_advanced.blizz_enderium: Each damage tool taken has a 10% chance to increase most stats.With maximum amplifier of 25%.
Each damage tool taken has a 10% chance to increase most stats.With maximum amplifier of 25%.
Each damage tool taken has a 10% chance to increase most stats.With maximum amplifier of 25%.
Reduce 20% damage when below 5,otherwise increase 10%,after armor value is calculated.
Mysterious white crystal from the outer space.
material.tinkers_advanced.compressed_iro: Compressed Iron is the iron compressed.
Deals 3 + modifier's level of magic damage.Each durability loss requires 25 AE to fix.Fix faster with higher modifier level.
Deals 3 + modifier's level of magic damage.Each durability loss requires 25 AE to fix.Fix faster with higher modifier level.
Deals 3 + modifier's level of magic damage.Each durability loss requires 25 AE to fix.Fix faster with higher modifier level.
material.tinkers_advanced.iridium.flavor: Extremely rare metal with low chemical reactivity.
material.tinkers_advanced.irradium.armor: Each Sv of radiation reduce 5% damage. At a maximum of 75%
material.tinkers_advanced.irradium.encyc: Each Sv of radiation boost 5% damage. At a maximum of 75%
material.tinkers_advanced.irradium.flavo: Hard and radioactive.Best material to play a trick on your enemy!
material.tinkers_advanced.irradium.range: Each Sv of radiation boost 5% damage. At a maximum of 75%
material.tinkers_advanced.nutritive_slim: Completely free of heavy metal, safe to eat.
material.tinkers_advanced.pneumatic_stee: 100mL of air is needed for a slash.
material.tinkers_advanced.protocite.ency: Grant 3 Fortune and Looting level after 5 times of mining or attacking, at a maximum of 3 * trait level.
material.tinkers_advanced.refined_obsidi: Boosts 5% attack speed per level on use,with a maximum 50% each level.
material.tinkers_advanced.stibnite.flavo: An explosive nether ore, sounds familiar...
material.tinkers_advanced.void_steel.arm: Each damage tool taken has a 10% chance to increase most stats.With maximum amplifier of 25%. 25% chance for dodging arrow.
material.tinkers_advanced.void_steel.enc: Each damage tool taken has a 10% chance to increase most stats.With maximum amplifier of 25%.
material.tinkers_advanced.void_steel.ran: Each damage tool taken has a 10% chance to increase most stats.With maximum amplifier of 25%.
material.tinkers_advanced.voltaic_crysta: An electric material that shocks you.
modifier.tinkers_advanced.aerial_protect: Blocks 5 damage,reduces damage above 5 by 10%.Consumes air.
modifier.tinkers_advanced.air_slash.desc: Shoots powerful slash when swinging using main hand. Consumes air.
modifier.tinkers_advanced.annihilate.des:
Deal explosion damage to both you and targets in a range.
Make your attack bypasses most of vanilla defense approach.
modifier.tinkers_advanced.atom_grade.des: Adds 1 defense slot or upgrade slot to your tool,depends on the type of tool.
modifier.tinkers_advanced.atom_grade.fla: Though It's still less complex than a human brain.
Gain lightning resistance effect.Have 5% chance to cancel damage and shock attacker.
Cause arcs striking toward other targets in a range.
Freeze target on hit.Deals 2x damage to ignited enemies.
Cooling on it's own.What is the first law of thermal dynamics doing?
modifier.tinkers_advanced.combustion_gen: Your tool can produce energy by consuming Furnace Fuels. Base speed +200 FE/t.
modifier.tinkers_advanced.compressed_air: Your tool can consume compressed air to generate energy. Base speed +Pressure*50FE/t ,conversion efficiency is ideal to Compressed Air Dynamo.
modifier.tinkers_advanced.disintegrate.d: Increase mining speed and durability cost on constant mining.
Your tool will accept vibration and mark the causing mob.Attacking marked mob will deal extra sonic damage.
modifier.tinkers_advanced.edging_technol: Adds 1 upgrade & ability slot to your tool.
Nothing is more exotic than this.
modifier.tinkers_advanced.elastic.descri: When tool takes damage, have a chance to recover durability instead of being damaged.
Consume energy to recover food level.Base speed +100FE/t, each food level requires 25kFE.
Make you directly powered by electricity.
modifier.tinkers_advanced.ender_tuner.de: Inflicts Enderfierce, grant 50kFE energy storage. Shift - right click to open a menu to adjust your tool.
modifier.tinkers_advanced.energy_bin.des: Clears all the energy stored inside tool every tick.
modifier.tinkers_advanced.energy_bin.fla: I'm not sure if energy can be thrown into lava...
modifier.tinkers_advanced.energy_distrib: Distribute energy stored to hot bar, offhand and armor items.
modifier.tinkers_advanced.extra_capacity: According to the formula W=0.5CU²: With greater capacity, you can store more energy at the same voltage.
modifier.tinkers_advanced.flame_adaptive: Gain fire resistance when equipped.Slowly recover durability when user is on fire.
modifier.tinkers_advanced.flux_arrow.des: In Activated Mode,consumes energy to create arrow.In Empowered Mode,potion arrows can be created,arrows will explode on hit.
modifier.tinkers_advanced.flux_defense.d: In Activated mode,5% chance for blocking the damage.In Empowered Mode,consumes energy to cancel up to 20% of damage.
modifier.tinkers_advanced.flux_infused.d: +1MFE energy storage each level.Cycles mode when pressing CoFH-Mode Switch key.
modifier.tinkers_advanced.focusing_array: Increase 100% fluid effect range each level.
Similar to the dish antenna in your home.
modifier.tinkers_advanced.fragile.descri: For each level increases 10% chance of drawing extra 1 durability when damaged.
modifier.tinkers_advanced.ionized.descri: Inflict Ionized effect,causing damage and status decrease.
modifier.tinkers_advanced.metamorphium.d: Every damage taken by your tool will increase its strength.
modifier.tinkers_advanced.nutritive_slim: Consumes overslime to recover food level when equipped.
modifier.tinkers_advanced.overslime_gene: Your tool can produce energy by consuming Overslime. Base speed +250 FE/t, each overslime produces 5kFE.
Slime is a natural ion exchanging medium.
modifier.tinkers_advanced.piezoelectric_: Generate energy when hitting target. Base speed +100FE/t, each damage generates 10FE.
modifier.tinkers_advanced.plague.descrip: Inflicts Plague effect, causing damage and reduce health regeneration.
modifier.tinkers_advanced.platinoid_cata: Increase energy generate/consume speed, but reduce generate amount and increase consume amount. 25% each level.
modifier.tinkers_advanced.player_locatin: R-Click with a paper in inventory to store your ID to the tool.
modifier.tinkers_advanced.poison_defense: Grant immunity to Poison and Wither.
Grant immunity to debuffs. When worn in chest slot, gain Haste,Jump Boost and Speed effect.
Energy pack that don't need energy.
modifier.tinkers_advanced.proto_refining: Grant higher Fortune and Looting level after constantly mining or attacking.
modifier.tinkers_advanced.quantum_techno: Adds 1 upgrade & ability slot to your tool.
modifier.tinkers_advanced.radiation_burn: Inflicts radiation to target. Increase damage when attacking radiated targets.
modifier.tinkers_advanced.radioactive_ar:
Inflicts radiation to attacker, take less damage from radiated attackers. 
Gain 25% radiation resistance each level.
Have you worn a lead pants?
modifier.tinkers_advanced.reactive_explo: Blocks 25% damage taken and release them in the form of explosion. Grant immunity to explosion and fire
modifier.tinkers_advanced.resonance_ampl: How do you use standing waves to measure distance?
modifier.tinkers_advanced.return_to_slim: Gain overslime after mining or killing, amount determined by the amount of loot.
modifier.tinkers_advanced.sculk_resonanc: Translate damage dealt into sonic boom.
modifier.tinkers_advanced.sensor_interru: Make you less visible to hostile enemies.
modifier.tinkers_advanced.shaping.descri: Add upgrade slots (Or defense slots on armor) to your tool after tool being damaged many times.
modifier.tinkers_advanced.smeltery_gener: Your tool can produce energy by consuming Smeltery Fuels. Base speed +250 FE/t , affected by temperature (Lava = 1x).
modifier.tinkers_advanced.stabilize.desc: Slightly increase melee damage or armor. Stabilize nearby stibnite ore after mining.
modifier.tinkers_advanced.supreme_densit: Enhance the effect of most melee and ranged modifiers.
Enhance the effect of most armor modifiers.
modifier.tinkers_advanced.tetanus.descri:
Inflicts tetanus effect to your enemy.
Slightly reduce it's armor and make it take 20% more damage on hurt.
modifier.tinkers_advanced.tetanus.flavor: Leaving scraps in your enemy's body.
modifier.tinkers_advanced.thermal_enhanc: All effects from Basalz Defense,Shattered,Blitz Defence,Shocked,Frost Plating,Blizz Defense and Flame Adaptive.
+1 Fortune and Looting level.In Activated mode,consumes energy to boost mining speed and deal extra 4 damage on attack.In Empowered mode,fires Elemental Slash on swinging.
modifier.tinkers_advanced.transition_cat: Increase energy generate amount or reduce energy consume amount. 25% each level.
modifier.tinkers_advanced.unstable.descr: Randomize attack damage, dig speed and durability cost.
modifier.tinkers_advanced.void_dodging.d: Grant a chance to dodge and then destroy incoming arrow.
tool_stat.tinkers_advanced.flux_core.cap: Max Energy multiplier that will be multiplied to the base capacity.
tool_stat.tinkers_advanced.flux_core.gen: The generate/consumption rate for Energy Module traits.
tooltip.tinkers_advanced.allow_insert: Energy receive activated. R-click to disable.
tooltip.tinkers_advanced.disallow_insert: Energy receive disabled. R-click to activate.
tooltip.tinkers_advanced.exchanger1: Allow interactions between tool placed inside and other blocks.
tooltip.tinkers_advanced.exchanger2: Processes energy generation for Electron Tuner.
tooltip.tinkers_advanced.exchanger3: R-Click to insert tool ,R-Click with tool handle to toggle energy ejection.
tooltip.tinkers_advanced.neutronite_1: Neutron stars are dead star cores left over by supernova.
tooltip.tinkers_advanced.neutronite_2: §bFusion§f is the life of star. The formation of§c iron§f marks a dead end for a star.
tooltip.tinkers_advanced.neutronite_3: Although it's impossible to land on a neutron star, creating a star is quite possible.
tooltip.tinkers_advanced.primary_mode_in: Right click with a tool handle to switch mode.
tooltip.tinkers_advanced.stibnite_ore: It's important to be careful when mining this ore...
tooltip.tinkers_advanced.ultra_dense_boo: A book that is ultra dense, or a book made by Ultra Dense? Nobody knows.
